title: University of Hawaii quasi-endowment trust fund
context: [§304A-2355] University of Hawaii quasi-endowment trust fund. There is established the University of Hawaii quasi-endowment trust fund into which shall be deposited income derived from the university&rsquo;s endowment fund. Income deposited into this account may be expended by the university as set forth by the board of regents in policies and guidelines for costs and expenses associated with student financial aid programs, including scholarships and student support services, awards, and project opportunities for the university. [L 2015, c 106, §1]
